Name: Jewel Match Twilight
About the game: Unravel this creepy-crawly match-3 adventure and unveil haunted castles that will leave your spine tingling! Traverse vast levels at your own pace with one of 3 modes to fit your play style, and buy upgrades from the sinister shop to aid you in your travels. Play minigames including hidden object and mahjong to earn bonus money and unlock spooky decorations for each eerie scene! Enjoy a spellbinding soundtrack while you explore each of the 120 huge match-3 levels even further with the optional secret crypts that hold untold riches! Features: - Traverse 120 enormous levels. - Timed, relaxed, and move limited modes! - 48 replayable bonus games, including Mahjong and Hidden Object Scenes. - Unlock 7 unique power-ups. - Gorgeous wallpapers - Spooky soundtrack.
